item.title: 加拿大帝国商业银行预计加拿大政府债券发行量将增长 22
item.description: 贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）政府的最大贷款人之一表示，今年政府最终将在债券市场上举债约 2,500 亿加元（1,860 亿美元）。【原文：Justin Trudeau’s government will end up tapping the bond market for around C$250 billion ($186 billion) in debt this year, one of the country’s biggest lenders says.】

item.title: 美国钢铁投放买家在暴跌后持有 800 万美元纸张利润
item.description: 据报道，美国总统拜登计划对日本新日本制铁公司（Nippon Steel Corp.【原文：Traders who snapped up bearish United States Steel Corp. options early on Wednesday stand to make more than 10 times their money after the stock plunged following a report that President Biden plans to express concerns about a proposed takeover by Japan’s Nippon Steel Corp.】

item.title: 美联储称基础货币交易 "显著 "少于预期
item.description: 美联储研究人员称，国债基础交易这一债券市场策略引起了监管机构的密切关注，其资金量可能只有通常估计的三分之一。【原文：Federal Reserve researchers say the amount of money in the Treasury basis trade, a bond-market strategy that has drawn the scrutiny of regulators, could be as little as a third of commonly used estimates.】

item.title: 做空巴西国家石油公司的对冲基金在周五暴跌中获胜
item.description: 巴西国有石油公司巴西石油公司（Petroleo Brasileiro SA）股价暴跌，单个交易日价值缩水约 110 亿美元，这帮助提高了一家总部位于里约热内卢的对冲基金经理的收益。【原文：The plunge in shares of Brazilian state-owned oil company Petroleo Brasileiro SA that erased about $11 billion in value in a single session helped boost returns at a Rio de Janeiro-based hedge fund manager.】

item.title: 前阿波罗合伙人在上诉中被美国证券交易委员会驳回欺诈判决
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management）的一名前高级合伙人被美国证券交易委员会指控欺诈该公司的私募股权基金，上诉后撤销了对他的判决。【原文：A former Apollo Global Management senior partner accused by the Securities and Exchange Commission of defrauding the firm’s private equity funds got a judgment against him reversed on appeal.】

item.title: 随着 10 年期债务的增加，哥伦比亚希望延长 TES 的期限
item.description: 哥伦比亚财政部一位高级官员表示，哥伦比亚很可能发行期限更长的当地比索债券，以避免在 2033 年基准到期时出现过多债务。【原文：Colombia is likely to issue local peso bonds with longer maturities to avoid having too much debt due its 2033 benchmark, according to a top finance ministry official.】

item.title: 美国卫生监管机构对联合健康网络攻击展开调查
item.description: 美国卫生部门正在调查联合健康集团公司（UnitedHealth Group Inc.【原文：US health authorities are investigating whether the cyberattack on UnitedHealth Group Inc.’s Change Healthcare unit involved a breach of personal health information.】

item.title: 巴黎俱乐部债权国同意取消索马里 20 亿美元债务
item.description: 世界上最富有的国家同意免除索马里 20 多亿美元的债务，以帮助这个饱受战争蹂躏的国家恢复债务可持续性。【原文：The world’s richest nations agreed to cancel more than $2 billion of Somalia’s liabilities to help the war-torn nation restore debt sustainability.】

item.title: 尼日利亚计划在中断两年后于 6 月前首次发行欧洲债券
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，尼日利亚已聘请花旗银行（Citibank NA）、摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）和高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Nigeria has hired investment banks including Citibank NA, JPMorgan Chase & Co. and Goldman Sachs Group Inc. to advise it on its first eurobond issue since 2022, according to people familiar with the deal.】

item.title: Cerberus 成为收购波兰 VeloBank 的领跑者
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，Cerberus Capital Management LP 正在领跑收购波兰资产排名第十的大银行 VeloBank SA。【原文：Cerberus Capital Management LP is leading the race to buy VeloBank SA, Poland’s 10th biggest lender by assets, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧盟初步支持 50 亿欧元的乌克兰武器基金
item.description: 欧盟各国大使原则上同意向乌克兰提供 50 亿欧元（约合 55 亿美元）的军事援助，此前成员国达成了一项妥协，允许从欧盟外部采购。【原文：Ambassadors of the European Union agreed in principle to provide €5 billion ($5.5 billion) in military support for Ukraine, after member states reached a compromise to allow purchases from outside the bloc.】

item.title: 华尔街反击纽约最新主权债务法案
item.description: 华尔街行业组织再次警告说，纽约州全面改革主权债务重组程序的努力将给发展中经济体带来意想不到的后果。【原文：Wall Street industry groups are once again warning that a New York state effort to overhaul the process of restructuring sovereign debt would have unintended consequences for developing economies.】

item.title: FanDuel 所有者对英国主要竞争对手的领先优势日益扩大
item.description: Paddy Power 的所有者 Flutter Entertainment Plc 在过去一年里一直在股市上落后于英国博彩业的竞争对手 Entain Plc，摩根大通分析师认为这种情况不会很快改变。【原文：Paddy Power owner Flutter Entertainment Plc has left UK betting rival Entain Plc trailing on the stock market over the past year, and JPMorgan Chase & Co. analysts don’t see that changing any time soon.】

item.title: 科恩的 Point72 避开新现金，资产达到创纪录的 320 亿美元
item.description: Point72 资产管理公司（Point72 Asset Management）在创始人史蒂夫-科恩（Steve Cohen）重返对冲基金行业六年后，在过去一年里筹集了约 38 亿美元，资产规模创下历史新高。【原文：Point72 Asset Management raised roughly $3.8 billion over the past year, bringing assets to a record high, six years after founder Steve Cohen returned to the hedge fund industry.】

item.title: Point72 数字资产技术主管肖菲尔德离职，成为最新的加密货币离职案例
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，史蒂夫-科恩（Steve Cohen）的 Point72 资产管理公司数字资产技术主管特伦斯-肖菲尔德（Terence Schofield）最近离开了这家对冲基金。【原文：Terence Schofield, the head of digital assets technology at Steve Cohen’s Point72 Asset Management, recently left the hedge fund, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧盟协议陷入僵局，巴西希望向印度和非洲出口农产品
item.description: 巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）希望扩大对印度和非洲的农业出口，在南美贸易集团与欧盟之间的贸易谈判陷入僵局的同时，更加关注新市场。【原文：Brazil President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva wants to expand agriculture exports to India and Africa, focusing more on new markets while trade talks between a South America trade bloc and the European Union languish.】

item.title: 欧洲备受打击的首次公开募股市场初现复苏迹象
item.description: 少数几家大公司的股票上市，使欧洲的首次公开募股市场在经历了两年的交易中断和首次交易疲软之后，走上了复苏的轨道。【原文：Stock listings from a handful of big companies have put Europe’s initial-public offering market on track for a revival following two years of pulled deals and weak trading debuts.】

item.title: 高盛称 "巨型邮轮 "将为邮轮需求注入新动力
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：The impressive run from cruise-line operators over the past year has room to run, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 以色列创纪录的战争预算在最后一刻受阻后获得最终批准
item.description: 以色列议会周四最终批准了修订后的 2024 年预算，国防开支将创下历史新高。【原文：Israel’s parliament gave final approval on Thursday to a revised 2024 budget swollen by defense outlays that will bring spending to an all-time high.】

item.title: 部长称南非放弃出售国家航空公司
item.description: 南非公共企业部长普拉温-戈尔丹（Pravin Gordhan）表示，由于未能就公平价值和其他条款达成一致，南非政府终止了出售其国旗航空公司控股权的交易。【原文：South Africa’s government terminated a deal to sell a controlling stake in its flag carrier after failing to agree on a fair value and other terms, Public Enterprises Minister Pravin Gordhan said.】

item.title: 丹佛地区房租飙升催生 2 亿美元学生住房债券
item.description: 科罗拉多矿业大学在六个月内第二次求助于市政市场，以解决其位于丹佛郊外、拥有约 7000 名学生的校园住房短缺问题。【原文：The Colorado School of Mines is turning to the muni market for the second time in six months to address a housing shortage for its growing campus of roughly 7,000 students just outside of Denver.】

item.title: 摩科瑞能源公司首席交易员舍努达即将离职
item.description: 摩科瑞能源集团（Mercuria Energy Group Ltd.）的首席交易员、曾经的继承人马吉德-舍努达（Magid Shenouda）即将离开公司。【原文：Mercuria Energy Group Ltd.’s head trader and one-time heir apparent Magid Shenouda is leaving the company.】

item.title: 澳大利亚运输部马斯拉尼因反洗钱调查被减薪
item.description: 多伦多道明银行（Toronto-Dominion Bank）首席执行官巴拉特-马斯拉尼（Bharat Masrani）去年因该银行收购第一地平线公司（First Horizon Corp.【原文：Toronto-Dominion Bank Chief Executive Officer Bharat Masrani took a pay cut last year over the lender’s scuttled acquisition of First Horizon Corp. and the US probe it faces over anti-money-laundering controls.】

item.title: 墨西哥央行副行长梅希亚表示关键利率仍有调整空间
item.description: 墨西哥央行副行长奥马尔-梅希亚（Omar Mejia）表示，他认为墨西哥央行在 3 月 21 日下次会议之前还有调整参考利率的空间。【原文：Banxico Deputy Governor Omar Mejia said he sees room to adjust the Mexican central bank’s reference rate ahead of its next meeting on March 21.】

item.description:

item.title: 中国承诺为设备升级提供中央政府资金
item.description: 中国已承诺由中央政府出资鼓励消费者和企业更换老旧设备和商品，这是其今年实现约 5%经济增长计划的一个支柱。【原文：China has pledged central government funds to encourage consumers and businesses to replace old equipment and goods, a pillar of its plan for economic growth of about 5% this year.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯获得 130 亿美元投资促进旅游业发展
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯已吸引约 130 亿美元的私营部门投资进入其旅游业，目的是分担与成为新的旅游热点计划相关的支出成本。【原文：Saudi Arabia has attracted about $13 billion in private sector investment into its tourism industry as it aims to share the cost of spending associated with its plan to become a new travel hot spot.】

item.title: 追逐趋势的经济学家重回华尔街，涨幅达到 45
item.description: 得益于股市的持续上涨和整个大宗商品市场的大幅波动，华尔街的 "趋势追踪 "专家们又开始了自2008年以来的最佳开局。【原文：Trend-following quants are rallying back on Wall Street for their best start to a year since 2008, thanks to relentless stock market gains and sharp moves across the commodity complex.】

item.title: 要解决 80 亿美元的亏损问题，ADM 需要的不仅仅是营养改革
item.description: 今年早些时候，Archer-Daniels-Midland 公司会计实务被调查的消息传出后，仅用了一天时间，公司价值就损失了 80 多亿美元。反弹需要更长的时间。【原文：It took just one day for Archer-Daniels-Midland Co. to lose more than $8 billion in value following news of an investigation into its accounting practices earlier this year. Bouncing back will take a lot longer.】

item.title: 塔塔汽车公司将在印度南部建造价值 11 亿美元的汽车厂
item.description: 塔塔汽车有限公司计划斥资 900 亿卢比（11 亿美元）在印度南部泰米尔纳德邦建造一家汽车厂。【原文：Tata Motors Ltd. is planning to spend 90 billion rupees ($1.1 billion) on a vehicle factory in the southern Indian state of Tamil Nadu.】
